sentences.english: Soliciting a scarlet woman in China can be a serious crime.
sentences.chinese: 在中國大陸拉皮條，可能是重罪。

sentences.english: Crimes are usually classified as felonies and misdemeanors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪通常分爲重罪與輕罪。

sentences.english: New York investigators say the Super Bowl hero could face felony gun charges.
sentences.chinese: 紐約調查員表示這位超級明星將面臨涉槍的重罪控告。

sentences.english: The judges will be a little skittish about giving light sentences to a man with a record.
sentences.chinese: 法官們對於有前科的人重罪輕判大都有點顧慮。

sentences.english: I look back on the way I was then a young stupid kid who committed that terrible crime.
sentences.chinese: 我回首前塵往事，那個犯下重罪的小笨蛋。

sentences.english: Kamil was arraigned in Los Angeles and charged with felony bank fraud.
sentences.chinese: 卡米爾在洛杉磯受到傳訊，被指控犯有銀行詐騙重罪。

sentences.english: Under a number of statutes, the felony must be a proximate cause of the death.
sentences.chinese: 在很多法律規定下，該重罪必須是導致死亡的近因。

sentences.english: If you havecommitted a felony, you may also be tied up and whipped by bamboo whips.
sentences.chinese: 如果你犯有重罪，就可能被捆住並給以鞭刑。

sentences.english: And the white-handed is not clean in the doings of the felon.
sentences.chinese: 當重罪嫌犯的所最所爲，就算無罪的雙手也未必清白。

sentences.english: There is no division in civil law comparable to that between felonies and misdemeanors in the criminal system.
sentences.chinese: 在民法中，沒有像刑法體系中關於重罪和輕罪的區別。

sentences.english: Committing a forgery is a felony, but driving an automobile in excess of the speed limit is a misdemeanor.
sentences.chinese: 進行僞造是犯重罪，但超速駕駛屬於輕罪。

sentences.english: Felonies are more serious crimes than misdemeanors.
sentences.chinese: 重罪與輕罪相比是要嚴重許多的犯罪。

sentences.english: Convicts were not sent to Australia for serious crimes.
sentences.chinese: 流放到澳洲犯人都非重罪。

sentences.english: He carried out a felonious act.
Would you eat at Felony Franks?
sentences.chinese: 你會到重罪弗蘭克斯餐館去用餐嗎？

sentences.english: In ancient China, if an officials cheated the emperor, his entire family would be exterminated.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代欺君的官員往往會被判處夷族的重罪。

definition: to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
